extension.summary: This unblockr.net plugin ensures your registered IP is kept up to date
extension.description: This plugin will run at startup each time XBMC is run. It calls a special function within Unblockr that will check your current IP address and make sure that Unblockr knows what it is. If you're on the move, maybe you're round at a friend's house and fancy catching the latest release, use this. At home, forget all about it and let us do the work.
